name: ElectricSQL
title: electric-sql.com
shortDescription: ElectricSQL is a Postgres sync engine designed to simplify data synchronization across applications. It supports any Postgres, any data model, and any web framework, making it versatile for developers. Example use cases include building real-time dashboards, syncing data for AI agents, and enhancing app collaboration. It's particularly beneficial for projects requiring high-throughput data delivery to millions of users.
pros: Supports any Postgres and data model
Scales to millions of users efficiently
Fully open source with flexible integration
cons: Limited to HTTP and JSON for interactions
